TITLE: The Disruption of SARS-CoV-2 RBD/ACE-2 Complex by Ubrogepant Is Mediated by Interface Hydration
INFORMATION: Ubrogepant rupture the interaction at the RBD/ACE-2 interface residues of SARS-CoV-2 RBD/ACE-2  complex results in loss of function

TITLE: Increased circulating microparticles and inflammatory factors aggravate coronavirus disease 2019 (COVID-19)
INFORMATION: Levels of cMP, IL-6, IL-8 and IL-10 are increased in the severe case of COVID-19 patients

TITLE: Potential inhibitors against papain-like protease of novel coronavirus(SARS-CoV-2)from FDA approved drugs
INFORMATION: Sixteen FDA approved drugs, including chloroquine and formoterol, was found to bind the target enzyme with significant affinity and good geometry, suggesting their potential to be utilized against the virus.

TITLE: Molecular Docking Study of Novel COVID-19 Protease with Low Risk Terpenoides Compounds of Plants
INFORMATION: Terpenoids effectively inhibit the virus protease(COVID-19).

TITLE: COVID-19: Attacks the 1-Beta Chain of Hemoglobin and Captures the Porphyrin to Inhibit Human Heme Metabolism
INFORMATION: ORF1ab, ORF8, ORF3a and ORF10 binds to porphyrin and alter heme metabolism

TITLE: Computational target-based drug repurposing of elbasvir, an antiviral drug predicted to bind multiple SARS-CoV-2 proteins
INFORMATION: In silico study of antiviral effect of elbasvir by binding to SARS-CoV-2 proteins
